short_description: Powerful gaming desktop with 11th Gen Intel Core processors
detailed_description: The Alienware Aurora R12 is a powerful gaming desktop with 11th Gen Intel Core processors, up to 64GB of RAM, and up to 4TB of storage. It also features NVIDIA GeForce RTX graphics for exceptional gaming performance.

The ASUS ROG Strix G15 is a high-performance gaming laptop with a 144Hz display and up to 10th Gen Intel Core processors. It also features NVIDIA GeForce RTX graphics, up to 32GB of RAM, and up to 1TB of SSD storage.

short_description: Compact gaming desktop with NVIDIA GeForce graphics
detailed_description: The MSI Trident 3 is a compact gaming desktop with NVIDIA GeForce graphics, up to 10th Gen Intel Core processors, and up to 32GB of RAM. It also features up to 1TB of SSD storage and customizable RGB lighting.

short_description: VR-ready gaming desktop with NVIDIA GeForce RTX graphics
detailed_description: The HP Omen Obelisk is a VR-ready gaming desktop with NVIDIA GeForce RTX graphics, up to 10th Gen Intel Core i9 processors, and up to 64GB of RAM. It also features up to 1TB of SSD storage and customizable RGB lighting.

short_description: Gaming laptop with 240Hz display and NVIDIA GeForce RTX graphics
detailed_description: The Acer Predator Helios 300 is a gaming laptop with a 240Hz display and NVIDIA GeForce RTX graphics. It features up to 10th Gen Intel Core i7 processors, up to 32GB of RAM, and up to 1TB of SSD storage for fast and smooth gaming.
